Hi,How are you?Nerve pains are also known as neuralgias. These can occur as a result of peripheral neuropathy. Diabetes and B 12 deficiency are two common causes of peripheral neuropathy.In your case fibromyalgia can also be a cause of nerve pain.http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FibromyalgiaPlease discuss this with your doctor and make sure you do regular physical exercise and sleep for at least 8 hrs in the night. Take care!
